title: AKDMKS : Akademiks clothing : 004 : "Aka Blackletter Goldenrod"
content:
Akademiks is an NYC-based clothing company, established in 1999. I am posting a series of fonts used by Akademiks. Please help me ID the fonts.

“Aka Blackletter Goldenrod”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508004907im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aka6935_5943.jpg)

004
author: dirtcastle
